about_the_game:
Explore a corrupted beach.

Play as a Muri, a fish-mouse creature, and platform your way atop the pillar, run in the grass with pixies, venture to the beach, explore the cave, make your way high atop the mountain, and finally reach the cliff outlook by the beach in your explorations of Shoreline.

Cleanse the world of corruption.

Use your trusty watergun to bring back the beach's beauty. Utilize your watergun in different ways to get rid of corruption, by using the wide spray or the pressure aim. Aiming can be used to clean, push, or break things while the wide spray is excellent for efficiently cleaning your close surroundings. Make sure also to give the cute little pixie creatures a wash as well, it makes them very happy!

Restore the colorful beach's beauty!

As you clean the world you will see the color return to the once very grey beach in a highly satisfying way. When you have cleared the pillar, the shell, or the pond, its whole surrounding area is restored and a lily pad will emerge to help create your path to the cliff outlook. Now, get to work fellow Muri!



Also, did we mention there are cute critters? *̥ ˚✧
